pages.text: A wearable item that offers a small amount of protection and can be $(item)enchanted$(). It can be repaired by using $(item)Leather$() in an $(item)Anvil$() or by crafting with three $(l:resources/impregnated_leather)Impregnated Leather$(/l).

pages.title: Special Properties
pages.text: When worn, the Baba Yaga's Hat provides an improved chance of creating an additional brew when using the $(l:kettle/kettle_intro)Kettle$(/l), and a small chance to create a third.$(br)The brew yield increases for more $(l:brewing/introduction#expertise)experienced$(/l) witches.$(p)The piece becomes invisible when the creature that wears it is invisible, and if the player is $(l:kettle/infusion_intro#light_infusion)Infused$(/l) it will occasionally teleport it a short distance away at the cost of some Infusion Power.
